I've download this and the the Dangerious tour both don't have sound how come?? What program do you use to burn it back onto dvd???

Well, the guy who made this release, didn't know what he is doing, he let the sound in wav format (uncompressed) and compressed the image :( and is not standard DVD compliant, use PowerDVD 5 or up, but chenge the settings for audio, whitin in PowerDVD, ctrl+c or click on configuration, go to audio tab and change the settings there, you'll have audio.
